speaker: President.
english: President. − I would like to pause for a moment to welcome, on behalf of all of us here in Parliament, the various visitor groups in the gallery. Let us continue with the debate.
original: President. − I would like to pause for a moment to welcome, on behalf of all of us here in Parliament, the various visitor groups in the gallery. Let us continue with the debate.
agenda_item: Progress made in equal opportunities and non-discrimination in the EU (debate)
